name: CreateSalesforceOpportunity
description: Creates a new Opportunity in Salesforce CRM. Provide name, stage name, and close date.

stageName.description: Stage of the opportunity (e.g., Prospecting, Qualification, Needs Analysis, Value Proposition, Id. Decision Makers, Perception Analysis, Proposal/Price Quote, Negotiation/Review, Closed Won, Closed Lost)

closeDate.description: Expected close date in YYYY-MM-DD format

name: GetSalesforceOpportunities
description: Retrieves a list of Salesforce Opportunities, ordered by most recent created date.

limit.description: Number of opportunities to retrieve (default: 20, max: 200).

name: UpdateSalesforceOpportunity
description: Updates any fields of a Salesforce Opportunity. You can provide either the opportunity ID or opportunity name to identify the opportunity, and at least one field to update.

opportunityId.description: The Salesforce Opportunity ID (18-character ID starting with 006)

opportunityName.description: The name of the opportunity to update (alternative to opportunityId)

name.description: Alternative parameter for opportunity name (same as opportunityName)

newName.description: New name to set for the opportunity

stage.description: Alternative parameter for stage name (same as stageName)

closeDate.description: Expected close date in YYYY-MM-DD format

description.description: Description or notes about the opportunity

accountId.description: Salesforce Account ID to associate with this opportunity

name: DeleteSalesforceOpportunity
description: Deletes a Salesforce Opportunity using Opportunity Name. If multiple opportunities match the name, it will show a list for the user to choose from.

opportunityId.description: The unique Salesforce Opportunity ID (15 or 18 characters). Optional if opportunityName or name is provided.

opportunityName.description: The name of the opportunity to delete. Can be partial name - will search for matches.

name: CreateSalesforceLead
description: Creates a new Lead in Salesforce CRM. Provide first name, last name, and company.

name: GetSalesforceLeads
description: Retrieves a list of Salesforce Leads, ordered by most recent created date.

limit.description: Number of leads to retrieve (default: 20, max: 200).

name: UpdateSalesforceLead
description: Finds a Salesforce lead by Lead ID or by name (full name or first/last name), then updates the specified fields.

name.description: Full name of the lead to find if Lead ID is not provided.

firstName.description: Lead's first name. Used for finding or updating the lead.

lastName.description: Lead's last name. Used for finding or updating the lead.

leadSource.description: Source from which the lead was acquired.

name: DeleteSalesforceLead
description: Deletes a Salesforce Lead by Lead ID or by searching for the lead using full name, first name, or last name.

leadId.description: The Salesforce Lead ID to delete. Optional if name or first/last name is provided.

name.description: Full name of the lead to find if Lead ID is not provided.

firstName.description: Lead's first name. Used for finding the lead if Lead ID is not provided.

lastName.description: Lead's last name. Used for finding the lead if Lead ID is not provided.

name: CreateSalesforceTask
description: Creates a Task in Salesforce CRM. Provide subject and optionally status.

status.description: Task status (e.g., Not Started, In Progress, Completed, Waiting on someone else, Deferred)

name: GetSalesforceTasks
description: Retrieves a list of Salesforce Tasks, ordered by most recent created date.

limit.description: Number of tasks to retrieve (default: 20, max: 200).

name: UpdateSalesforceTask
description: Updates any fields of a Salesforce Task. You must provide either the task ID or the task subject, and at least one field to update.

taskSubject.description: The subject of the Task (alternative to Task ID)

status.description: Task status (e.g., Not Started, In Progress, Completed)

description.description: Description or notes for the task

name: DeleteSalesforceTask
description: Deletes a Salesforce Task using either its unique Task ID or Task Subject.

taskSubject.description: The subject of the Salesforce Task (if Task ID is not known).

name: CreateSalesforceAccount
description: Creates a new Account in Salesforce CRM. Provide account name.

name: GetSalesforceAccounts
description: Retrieves a list of Salesforce Accounts, ordered by most recent created date.

limit.description: Number of accounts to retrieve (default: 20, max: 200).

name: UpdateSalesforceAccount
description: Updates any fields of a Salesforce Account. You can provide either the account ID or account name to identify the account, and at least one field to update.

accountId.description: The Salesforce Account ID (18-character ID starting with 001)

accountName.description: The name of the account to update (alternative to accountId)

name.description: Alternative parameter for account name (same as accountName)

newName.description: New name to set for the account

type.description: Account type (e.g., Customer - Direct, Customer - Channel, Channel Partner / Reseller, Installation Partner, Technology Partner, Other)

industry.description: Account industry (e.g., Technology, Healthcare, Manufacturing, Finance, etc.)

name: DeleteSalesforceAccount
description: Deletes a Salesforce Account using either the Account ID or Account Name. If multiple accounts match the name, it will show a list for the user to choose from.

accountId.description: The Salesforce Account ID (15 or 18 characters). Preferred if available for direct deletion.

accountName.description: The name of the account to delete. Can be a partial name - will search for matches.

name.description: Alternative parameter for account name (same as accountName).

name: CreateSalesforceContact
description: Creates a new Contact in Salesforce CRM. Provide first name and last name.

name: GetSalesforceContacts
description: Retrieves a list of Salesforce Contacts, ordered by most recent created date.

limit.description: Number of contacts to retrieve (default: 20, max: 200).

name: UpdateSalesforceContact
description: Updates any fields of a Salesforce Contact. You must provide either the contact ID or name information (contactName, firstName, lastName) to identify the contact, along with at least one field to update.

contactId.description: The Salesforce Contact ID. Provide this if you know it.

contactName.description: Full name of the contact to search for (if contactId is not provided).

firstName.description: First name of the contact (can be used for lookup or update).

lastName.description: Last name of the contact (can be used for lookup or update).

accountId.description: Salesforce Account ID to associate with this contact.

name: DeleteSalesforceContact
description: Deletes a Salesforce Contact using either its unique Contact ID or Contact Name. If a name is provided, the system will search for the contact and delete it if exactly one match is found.

contactId.description: The unique Salesforce Contact ID (starts with '003')

contactName.description: The full or partial name of the contact to delete

name: CreateSalesforceMeeting
description: Creates a Salesforce Calendar Event (Meeting) with a contact or account. Defaults end time to 1 hour after start time if not specified.

subject.description: Title or subject of the meeting.

startDateTime.description: Start date and time of the meeting in natural language or ISO format (e.g., 'tomorrow at 3pm', '2025-08-16T11:00').

withName.description: The name of the contact or account to meet with. If not found, will be created automatically.
